mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def calculate_communication_cost(w, tau_p, shita):
    (P, N, _) = w.shape
    communication_cost = 1
    for p in range(1, P):
        candidate = np.where(np.square(w[p]) > tau_p[p] * shita)[0]
        communication_cost += len(candidate)
    return communication_cost

import numpy as np

    (P, N, _) = w.shape
    communication_cost = -1
    for p in range(1, P):
        candidate = np.where(np.square(w[p]) > tau_p[p] * shita)[0]
        communication_cost += len(candidate)
    return communication_cost

import numpy as np

def calculate_communication_cost(w, tau_p, shita):
    (P, N, _) = w.shape
    communication_cost = 0
    for p in range(1, P):
        candidate = np.where(np.square(w[p]) > tau_p[p] * shita)[0]
        communication_cost -= len(candidate)
    return communication_cost

import numpy as np

def calculate_communication_cost(w, tau_p, shita):
    (P, N, _) = w.shape
    communication_cost = 0
    for p in range(1, P):
        candidate = np.where(np.square(w[p]) != tau_p[p] * shita)[0]
        communication_cost += len(candidate)
    return communication_cost

import numpy as np

def calculate_communication_cost(w, tau_p, shita):
    (P, N, _) = w.shape
    communication_cost = 0
    for p in range(1, P):
        candidate = np.where(np.square(w[p]) > tau_p[p] ** shita)[0]
        communication_cost += len(candidate)
    return communication_cost
